title: AI Frenzy Fueling Tech Dominance Rewrites Asia’s Market Playbook
description: The frenzy over artificial intelligence has helped Asian stocks outperform the world this year. It’s also transforming the region’s markets in a way that has fund managers racing to keep up.
content:
The frenzy over artificial intelligence has helped Asian stocks outperform the world this year. It’s also transforming the region’s markets in a way that has fund managers racing to keep up.

title: Atlassian forecasts second-quarter revenue above estimates on AI demand boost
description: Atlassian forecast second-quarter revenue above estimates on Thursday, betting on strong demand for its enterprise software services as businesses upgrade to integrate artificial intelligence, sending its shares up nearly 7% in extended trading.
content:
Businesses rushing to adopt AI are increasingly leveling up their systems to incorporate the data-intensive tech, helping drive demand for Atlassian's enterprise software services.

title: Tech Down After Meta Earnings -- Tech Roundup
description: Shares of technology companies fell as investors looked askance on Meta Platforms' free spending on artificial-intelligence capabilities. Shares of the Facebook owner fell about 10% and yields on its...
content: Shares of technology companies fell as investors looked askance on Meta Platforms' free spending on artificial-intelligence capabilities. Shares of the Facebook owner fell about 10% and yields on its bonds jumped after the company said it was looking... [1171 chars]

title: Meta Defies AI Spending Gloom With Its Record-Breaking Bond Sale
description: Meta Platforms Inc. found record-shattering demand for its bond sale on Thursday even as its shares plunged, in a sign that bond investors are looking past any concerns about its artificial-intelligence spending plans.
content:
Meta Platforms Inc. found record-shattering demand for its bond sale on Thursday even as its shares plunged, in a sign that bond investors are looking past any concerns about its artificial-intelligence spending plans.

title: GoDaddy raises 2025 revenue forecast on AI-driven demand
description: GoDaddy raised its annual revenue outlook on Thursday, expecting to boost sales from the addition of artificial intelligence features to its internet hosting services.
content:
GoDaddy has been rolling out AI features to gain traction for its services, which help businesses set up online domains, payment systems and expand their online presence.

title: Apple delivers strong quarter despite iPhone sales slowdown and ongoing artificial technology issues
description: Apple’s iPhone sales growth decelerated during its summertime quarter, but the company still delivered financial results that exceeded analyst projections while the trendsetting company continued to catch up to its Big Tech peers in the artificial intelligence race
content: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — Apple's iPhone sales growth decelerated during its summertime quarter, but the company still delivered financial results that exceeded analyst projections while the trendsetting company continued to catch up to its Big Tech peers... [1632 chars]

title: Uphold ownership rights to protect creative labor from AI
description: Policymakers need to reinforce copyright laws, hold artificial intelligence developers accountable for using protected works, ensure transparency in AI models
content:
There’s a principle that keeps a free market free: You can’t take what isn’t yours and sell it as your own. Yet, that is precisely what some of the most prominent players in artificial intelligence are doing.
